articles.title: After years of delays, state commission approves final rules for cannabis cafes
articles.description:
Massachusetts businesses will soon be able to acquire "social consumption" licenses, allowing customers to use marijuana at dispensaries, cafes, and more.

articles.title: New England’s shrimp fishery to shut down for the long haul after years of decline
articles.description:
New England fishermen, especially those from Maine, used to catch millions of pounds of small pink shrimp in the winter, but the business has been under a fishing moratorium since 2014.

The post New England’s shrimp fishery to shut down for the long haul after years of decline appeared first on Boston.com.
